description: Welcome to the Williamsburg Loft! We hope you have a wonderful stay!
name: Williamsburg Loft, Brooklyn, New York
review: This place was AMAZING !!!! The host was so accommodating and polite, I couldn't have imagined a more perfect stay. The house is SO lovely and the perfect image of "Brooklyn" - seriously phenomenal. A bar and coffee house are right downstairs, the whole block has the cutest places to eat and just a small walk away from really cool shops. Not to mention the VIEW! Can not wait to come again!!!
